projects.name: Sail-VM
projects.description: A bytecode interpreter virtual machine written in C. It strives to be simple, lightweight, and cross platform.

projects.name: SeaScript
projects.description: SeaScript is an upcoming frontend to Sail-VM.

projects.name: This-Website
projects.description: A flask app that hosts my projects

projects.name: Wave-Generator
projects.description: A command line sine wave generator written in rust.

projects.name: Kube
projects.description: Kube is an esoteric programming language inspired by BrainF. It adds a number of QOL improvements and more powerful IO. Kube is written in C.

projects.name: Binary-Converter
projects.description: An online tool for converting text to binary and vise versa.

projects.name: Hang-Man-Game
projects.description: A (very) rough clone of the classic hangman game i made back in 2019.
